participant_1.name: Ethan
participant_1.personality: Curious and friendly, always eager to learn more about others.
participant_1.background: Ethan is a software engineer with a passion for technology and a love for meeting new people.

participant_2.name: Sophia
participant_2.personality: Outgoing and talkative, enjoys sharing experiences and connecting with others.
participant_2.background: Sophia is a graphic designer who loves art and has a keen interest in travel and culture.

content.text: tell me something about yourself, will you?
